summary: Comprehensive testing of Valentine invitation website completed successfully. All 13 core features working perfectly including teddy bear landing, envelope animations, Yes/No button interactions, confetti effects, and mobile responsiveness.
passed_tests: Landing page loads with animated teddy bear holding envelope
Skip button in top-right corner functional
Teddy click transitions to envelope screen
Envelope screen with heart seal and 'Tap to open' hint
Envelope opening animation reveals Valentine card
Card displays 'Will you be my Valentine?' for Koco
Yes button styled coral/pink and clickable
No button dodge behavior with 'Nice try ðŸ˜Œ' message
Success screen shows 'Yay! Happy Valentine's, Koco' message
All data-testid attributes present for testing
Proper typography with script and clean fonts
Touch/click interactions work on desktop and mobile
